tooltips.guide.enable_double_entries: If unchecked, overwrite existing entries for this archetype. If checked, add a new entry even if the archetype already exists.
tooltips.guide.import.enable_double_entries: If unchecked, overwrite existing entries for matching archetypes. If checked, add entries even if archetypes already exist.

messages.guide.exclude_prompt: Select archetypes to exclude from the printed guide.
